extensionDescription.message: change every web page style,darken background color and brighten text color,prevent users see high brightness web page.

showDomainText.message: This setting page is Just for this domain:$URL$

cantAccessText.message: can not work in this page

goGlobalSettingText.message: If want to go to global setting page,click here

changeColor_description.message: Turn on this option to darken background color and brighten font color

highestContrastMode_description.message: Turn on this option will get 'darkest' background color and 'brightest' font color

imgBrightness_description.message: Turn down this value to decrease image brightness, '1' is 'keep original brightness', '0' is darkest(full black)

bgImgBrightness_description.message: If background image brightness is too high, trun to lower value,1 is 'keep original brightness',0 is darkest(full black)

minFontSize_description.message: If font size smaller than this value, font size will be enlarged to this value.

runTaskQuantityAt1Time.message: Quantity of 'change color elements' at one time

runTaskQuantityAt1Time_description.message: 'Determining this value' is depending on computing ability of computer. If this value is too big, maybe cause browser stuck or no response; if this value is too low, the 'changing color speed' will be slow.
